places.name: DY Patil Stadium
places.description: A state-of-the-art cricket stadium that hosts IPL matches and other sporting events.

places.name: Central Park
places.description: A large urban park with walking paths, gardens, and recreational facilities.

places.name: Wonders Park
places.description: A theme park with miniature replicas of world-famous monuments and attractions.

places.name: Palm Beach Marg
places.description: A beautiful coastal road with views of the creek and mangroves.

places.name: Flamingo Sanctuary
places.description: A protected wetland area where thousands of flamingos come during migration season.

places.name: Inorbit Mall
places.description: A premium shopping destination with international brands and entertainment options.

places.name: Sagar Vihar
places.description: A waterfront garden with boating facilities and scenic views.

places.name: Belapur Fort
places.description: Ancient fort ruins with historical significance dating back to the 17th century.

places.name: Kharghar Hills
places.description: Popular trekking destination with panoramic views of the city and surrounding areas.

places.name: Pandavkada Falls
places.description: Scenic waterfall that is especially beautiful during monsoon season.

places.name: APMC Market
places.description: One of Asia's largest wholesale markets for fruits, vegetables, and grains.

places.name: Jewel of Navi Mumbai
places.description: Beautiful garden with musical fountain and recreational facilities.

places.name: Mini Seashore
places.description: A small artificial beach area popular for evening walks and relaxation.

places.name: Raghuleela Mall
places.description: Popular shopping mall with stores, restaurants, and entertainment options.

places.name: Nerul Balaji Temple
places.description: Beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Balaji with South Indian architecture.
